an3.130:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
an3.130:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an3.130:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā anuruddho āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
an3.130:4.5: “idhāhaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ lokaṃ olokemi.
an3.130:4.6: Āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ.
an3.130:4.7: Atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti.
an3.130:5.1: “Yaṃ kho te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṃ hoti:
an3.130:5.2: ‘ahaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṃ lokaṃ volokemī’ti, idaṃ te mānasmiṃ.
an3.130:5.3: Yampi te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṃ hoti:
an3.130:5.4: ‘āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekaggan’ti, idaṃ te uddhaccasmiṃ.
an3.130:5.5: Yampi te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṃ hoti:
an3.130:5.6: ‘atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī’ti, idaṃ te kukkuccasmiṃ.
an3.130:5.7: Sādhu vatāyasmā anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya, ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharatū”ti.
an3.130:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho aparena samayena ime tayo dhamme pahāya, ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃhari.
an3.130:6.2: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
an3.130:6.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an3.130:6.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an3.130:6.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an3.130:6.6: Aññataro ca panāyasmā anuruddho arahataṃ ahosīti.
